value:
$WmMPID_水着セライナ,ch08_19_Celina_F_Swim20,Face|The sun here shines so brightly...
The sea shimmers, and the flowers
bloom... Is this paradise?$k$p...$k$p$WmMPID_水着ヨシュア,ch08_07_Jhosua_M_Swim20,Face|Hey, you. You're Selena, right?$k$pYour gloomy mug doesn't fit in too
well on a summer beach. Have you
even tried swimming yet?$k$p$WmMPID_水着セライナ,ch08_19_Celina_F_Swim20,Face|Ah. And you must be Joshua. I was
just reminiscing about my home.
I come from a cold, barren land...$k$pI wish my family and the people
of my village could see this place.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ヨシュア,ch08_07_Jhosua_M_Swim20,Face|Family, huh? Yeah, I guess I'd do the
same if I could...$k$pMy mom would likely scold me
for wasting my time though.$k$p$WmMPID_水着セライナ,ch08_19_Celina_F_Swim20,Face|Heh... She's strict, is she?$k$p$WmMPID_水着ヨシュア,ch08_07_Jhosua_M_Swim20,Face|Oh, strictest you've ever met.
I haven't seen her in years though...$k$p$WmMPID_水着セライナ,ch08_19_Celina_F_Swim20,Face|I see... I suppose I haven't been home
in quite some time myself...$k$pI wonder how everyone is...$k$p$WmMPID_水着ヨシュア,ch08_07_Jhosua_M_Swim20,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_水着ルーテ,ch08_08_Lute_F_Swim20,Face|*ahem*$k$pWould you step aside please? I'd like
a closer look at that creature scuttling
near your feet there...$k$p$WmMPID_水着ヨシュア,ch08_07_Jhosua_M_Swim20,Face|Oh, hi, Lute. Yeah, sure. Sorry.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ルーテ,ch08_08_Lute_F_Swim20,Face|No apologies necessary.$k$p...Why are you staring at me, though,
if you don't mind my asking?$k$p$WmMPID_水着ヨシュア,ch08_07_Jhosua_M_Swim20,Face|Oh! I was just wondering if you get
homesick sometimes too? I mean,
people like you don't usua—$k$p$WmMPID_水着ルーテ,ch08_08_Lute_F_Swim20,Face|"People like you"? Who else do you
know like me, hm?$k$pI think of home from time to time.
As much as anyone else.$k$pBut this world is full to bursting
with the unknown.$k$pNew knowledge, new experiences...
And that is what I value most.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ヨシュア,ch08_07_Jhosua_M_Swim20,Face|Huh. So, you're having too much fun
here to care about home.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ルーテ,ch08_08_Lute_F_Swim20,Face|Blunt, but not inaccurate. But then,
that may change as I learn more.
We shall see!$k$pIf I find something worthy of deeper
research, home might be a good
place to withdraw and concentrate.$k$p$WmMPID_水着セライナ,ch08_19_Celina_F_Swim20,Face|Heh...$k$p$WmMPID_水着ルーテ,ch08_08_Lute_F_Swim20,Face|Something humorous, Selena?$k$p$WmMPID_水着セライナ,ch08_19_Celina_F_Swim20,Face|You really do pursue only what
interests you...$k$pI feel like a hypocrite in comparison.
I speak of visiting home, but I never
act on my words.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ルーテ,ch08_08_Lute_F_Swim20,Face|If you think yourself contradictory,
why not correct the issue?$k$pPerhaps it's not so easy, I suppose.
Most are unable or unwilling to do
what they know they should do...$k$pFew are as exceptional as I am.
I ought to temper my expectations.$k$p$WmMPID_水着セライナ,ch08_19_Celina_F_Swim20,Face|I cannot disagree.$k$pI avoid the truth, ignore what I know
is right... I am weak.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ヨシュア,ch08_07_Jhosua_M_Swim20,Face|Hey, now!$k$pHow can the Fluorspar of Grado
talk like that?$k$p$WmMPID_水着セライナ,ch08_19_Celina_F_Swim20,Face|It's the truth. If I were not so weak,
I would choose a different path.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ルーテ,ch08_08_Lute_F_Swim20,Face|I can't judge whether you're weak
or strong, but...even if you are weak,
being weak isn't the worst thing.$k$pWhen people have something they
must protect, it makes them more
vulnerable, but stronger in ways too.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ヨシュア,ch08_07_Jhosua_M_Swim20,Face|Hm. You're right.$k$pWell, allow me to say I admire that
strong will of yours, and I do not
believe I'm the only one.$k$pI may have been an enemy general,
but I feel a close connection with
you nevertheless.$k$p$WmMPID_水着セライナ,ch08_19_Celina_F_Swim20,Face|Thank you, both of you.$k$pI'm glad we have this chance to meet
under new circumstances.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_双界ワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_FF_Pair,Face|Marth! Rhys! Are you ready? C'mon!
Here we go!$k$p$nMPID_仮面ルキナ|Right. Let's get this over with.
I have more shaved-ice flavors
to try.$k$p$WmMPID_水着キルロイ,ch09_16_Kilroy_M_Swim20,Face|Shaved ice? ...Do I need to come
along for that as well?$k$p$WmMPID_双界ワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_FF_Pair,Face|You sure do! They limit the number
of flavors each customer can get, so
we need you to get some too...$k$pSo, come on! Let's do this!$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_双界ワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_FF_Pair,Face|Youch... Let's fall back! We need
to strategize!$k$p$Sbs150|
